title: Misery Loves Company: A Collection of Dark Short Stories and Poetry
description: Misery Loves Company is a collection of dark poetry and short stories. Some are of scorned lovers, and broken hearts, others are tales of inner fears and darkest desires coming to the surface for the very first time. Misery Loves Company will take into the minds of some of the greatest authors, and catch a glimpse of their dark worlds, while they bring their words alive in this collection of misery at its best.
author: Misty Burke
